library.description: Select2 is a jQuery based replacement for select boxes. It supports searching, remote data sets, and infinite scrolling of results. Look and feel of Select2 is based on the excellent Chosen library.
library.name: Select2

library.description: Chosen is a JavaScript plugin that makes long, unwieldy select boxes much more user-friendly. It is currently available in both jQuery and Prototype flavors.
library.name: Chosen

library.description: File Upload widget with multiple file selection, drag&drop support, progress bar, validation and preview images, audio and video for jQuery. Supports cross-domain, chunked and resumable file uploads. Works with any server-side platform (Google App Engine, PHP, Python, Ruby on Rails, Java,ASP.NET etc.) that supports standard HTML form file uploads.
library.name: jQuery File Upload

library.description: FullCalendar is a jQuery plugin that provides a full-sized, drag & drop calendar like the one below. It uses AJAX to fetch events on-the-fly for each month and is easily configured to use your own feed format (an extension is provided for Google Calendar). It is visually customizable and exposes hooks for user-triggered events (like clicking or dragging an event). It is open source and dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
library.name: FullCalendar

library.description: jQuery Excel-like data grid editor
library.name: Handsontable

library.description: Multiple file upload plugin with progress-bar, drag-and-drop.
library.name: Fine Uploader

library.description: A lightweight jQuery dateinput picker
library.name: pickadate.js

library.description: Tokeninput is a jQuery plugin which allows your users to select multiple items from a predefined list, using autocompletion as they type to find each item. You may have seen a similar type of text entry when filling in the recipients field sending messages on facebook.
library.name: jQuery Tokeninput

library.description: This date range picker component for Twitter Bootstrap creates a dropdown menu from which a user can select a range of dates. It was created for the reporting UI at Improvely.
library.name: bootstrap-daterangepicker

library.description: The timepicker addon adds a timepicker to jQuery UI Datepicker, thus the datepicker and slider components (jQueryUI) are required for using any of these. In addition all datepicker options are still available through the timepicker addon.
library.name: jQuery Timepicker Addon

library.description: Selectize is the hybrid of a textbox and select box. It's jQuery-based and it's useful for tagging, contact lists, country selectors, and so on.
library.name: Selectize.js

library.description: Uniform masks your standard form controls with custom themed controls. It works in sync with your real form elements to ensure accessibility and compatibility.
library.name: Uniform

library.description:
The ZeroClipboard library provides an easy way to copy text to the clipboard using an invisible Adobe Flash movie, and a JavaScript interface. The "Zero" signifies that the library is invisible and the user interface is left entirely up to you.

This library is fully compatible with Flash Player 10, which requires that the clipboard copy operation be initiated by a user click event inside the Flash movie. This is achieved by automatically floating the invisible movie on top of a DOM element of your choice. Standard mouse events are even propagated out to your DOM element, so you can still have rollover and mouse down effects.
library.name: ZeroClipboard

library.description: Tag-it is a simple and configurable tag editing widget with autocomplete support.
library.name: Tag-it

library.description: VisualSearch.js enhances ordinary search boxes with the ability to autocomplete faceted search queries. Specify the facets for completion, along with the completable values for any facet. You can retrieve the search query as a structured object, so you don't have to parse the query string yourself.
library.name: VisualSearch.js

library.description: Garlic.js allows you to automatically persist your forms' text field values locally, until the form is submitted. This way, your users don't lose any precious data if they accidentally close their tab or browser.
library.name: Garlic.js

library.description: FooTable is a jQuery plugin that aims to make HTML tables on smaller devices look awesome - No matter how many columns of data you may have in them.
library.name: FooTable

library.description: Pikaday is a JavaScript datepicker with a light footprint and easy style-ability with modular CSS.
library.name: Pikaday

library.description: The jquery-week-calendar plugin provides a simple and flexible way of including a weekly calendar in your application. It is built on top of jquery and jquery ui and is inspired by other online weekly calendars such as google calendar. If you require a monthly calendar view, I highly recommend checking out the FullCalendar plugin by Adam Shaw.
library.name: jQuery Week Calendar

library.description: Colorpicker with no extra images.  Mobile and Internet Explorer support.  Can be customized, or used as a polyfill for  and acts as a polyfill
library.name: Spectrum Colorpicker

library.description: Countable is a JavaScript function to add live paragraph-, word- and character-counting to an HTML element. Countable is a zero-dependency library and comes in at 1KB when minified and gzipped.
library.name: Countable

library.description: An advanced jQuery plugin that wraps the Google Maps API's Geocoding and Places Autocomplete services. You simply provide an input that lets you search for locations with a nice autocomplete dropdown. Optionally add a container to show an interactive map and a form that will be populated with the address details.
library.name: GeoComplete

library.description: jQuery File Download is a cross server platform compatible jQuery plugin that allows for an Ajax-like file download experience that isn't normally possible using the web.
library.name: jQuery File Download

library.description: SelectBoxIt allows you to replace ugly and hard to use HTML select boxes with gorgeous and feature rich drop downs. Twitter Bootstrap, jQueryUI, and jQuery Mobile themes are supported right out of the box. To use SelectBoxIt, you do not have to rewrite any of your existing form validation logic or event handling. SelectBoxIt just works.
library.name: SelectBoxIt

library.description: glDatePicker is a simple, customizable, lightweight date picker calendar plugin for jQuery weighing in 4KB compressed (11KB uncompressed).
library.name: glDatePicker

library.description: This plugin replaces the default checkboxes and radio inputs for better looking ones. Easily customizable with editable PSD.
library.name: prettyCheckable

library.description: No flash, images, external libraries, CSS or 1px divs.
library.name: Flexi ColorPicker

library.description: Unlike many other colorpickers out there, colorjoe is truly scaleable. It is based on CSS and does not depend on external images. As a result, you can tweak its size to fit your purposes. Supports touch and AMD module definition as well.
library.name: colorjoe

library.description:
A jQuery library for formatting and validating form fields, based on / inspired by Stripe's jQuery.payment library.

Client side validation is not sufficient in any project because the javascript can be bypassed and people can submit requests directly to the server. However, that doesn't mean client side validation should be forgotten. This library is for those who care about the user experience.
library.name: Formance.js

library.description: If you need a lightweight, fast way to search through a list of items, and allow mispellings, then Fuse.js is for you
library.name: Fuse.js

library.description: AutoComplete is a jQuery Mobile plugin which allows developers to add autoComplete search boxes to your project.
library.name: jQuery Mobile Autocomplete

library.description: A JavaScript implementation of HTML5  for Firefox.
library.name: html5slider

library.description:
Date picker that allows you to select single dates or ranges across many month via scroll.
Features:
- popup/inline
- day/week/month select
- display current date
- allow disabling of dates and weekends
- language support for finnish, english, estonian, russian
library.name: jQuery continuousCalendar

library.description: Select customizer
library.name: ikSelect

library.description: A jQuery plugin that attaches a popup calendar to your input fields or shows an inline calendar for selecting individual dates or date ranges.
library.name: jQuery Datepicker

library.description: jQuery Simple Color is a very simple color-picker plugin that displays a square grid of selectable colors. I found a lot of the other color-picker plugins quite heavy, so I ended up writing this to provide a dead-simple alternative. The list of colors it uses can be customized, and the layout size etc can be configured to a certain extent.
library.name: SimpleColor

library.description: jQuery Placeholder Enhanced enhance the use of HTML5 placeholder attribute, provides cross-browser usage & styling.
library.name: jQuery Placeholder Enhanced

library.description:
jQuery Interdependencies is a Javascript library for
creating rules for form field interdependencies.
It is a helper library for building conditions telling when fields are shown and hidden based on the values of the other fields on the same form
library.name: jQuery Interdependencies

library.description: Pass*Field is a javascript that simplifies creation of sophisticated password fields.
library.name: Pass*Field

library.description: jQuery plugin that allows you to easily make sliders for range inputs.
library.name: slideControl.js

library.description: A JQuery Plugin for super-flexible Dropdowns based on dot.js Templates.
library.name: dropdown.dot.js

library.description: jQuery plugin to customize native radios and checkboxes with your own design.
library.name: Custom radio & checkbox

library.description: A JavaScript Native Color Picker Polyfill for Internet Explorer for the HTML5 .
library.name: nativeColorPicker

library.description: Starbox (rating stars) clone for jQuery
library.name: jStarbox

library.description:
The ShieldUI AutoComplete control provides users with suggestions depending on the typed text into it they can pick up when filling a form.
An easy to set up and use widget for both HTML+JS and ASP.NET MVC.
library.name: Shield UI Autocomplete

library.description:
The ShieldUI barcode suite is offered to users in pure JavaScript, as well as wrappers for ASP.NET, ASP.NET MVC and JAVA Wicket.
It allows easy and convenient creation of various bar codes compliant to the common standards.
library.name: ShieldUI barcode suite

library.description:
The Shield UI Button Control is offered both in pure JavaScript, as well as wrappers for ASP.NET MVC.
It features easy integration and comes with rich documentation and API reference.
library.name: Shield UI Button Control

library.description:
The ShieldUI Calendar component - is a lightweight, very fast and highly customizable UI control which allows users to select a date and perform an action. 
The widget allows you to navigate through days, months and years. The calendar has rich client side API for interaction with the component.
library.name: ShieldUI Calendar component

library.description:
The ShieldUI CheckBox component - is a lightweight, very fast and highly customizable UI control. It allows users to to check an option and perform action. 
The checkbox control allows three states to choose from: checked, unchecked and grayed (or intermediate state).
library.name: ShieldUI CheckBox component

library.description:
The ShieldUI ComboBox component – is a flexible, lightweight and highly customizable drop-down control. 
It allows you to choose one option from many or to type a custom value. If you want to disable text typing you can use the DropDown widget.
library.name: ShieldUI ComboBox component

library.description:
The ShieldUI DatePicker component - is a lightweight, very fast and highly customizable UI control which allows you to select a date and perform an action.
The control contains internally ShieldUI Calendar widget which allows you to navigate through days, months and years.
The DatePicker has rich client side API for interaction with the component.
library.name: ShieldUI DatePicker component

library.description:
The ShieldUI DateTimePicker component - is a lightweight, very fast and highly customizable UI control which allows you to select a date with a time part and perform an action. 
The control contains internally ShieldUI Calendar widget which allows you to navigate through days, months and years. The time part can be set via the ListBox control. 
The DateTimePicker has rich client side API for interaction with the component.
library.name: ShieldUI DateTimePicker component

library.description:
The ShieldUI DropDown component – is a flexible, lightweight and highly customizable drop-down control.
It allows users to choose one out of many options. 
It is easy to set up and reliable to use.
library.name: ShieldUI DropDown component

library.description:
The ShieldUI JQuery ListBox component - is a lightweight, very fast and highly customizable UI control which allows you to display a list of items. 
The control implements very efficient semantic rendering, by using list items and CSS.
library.name: ShieldUI JQuery  ListBox component

library.description: The ShieldUI LoadingPanel component - is a new look and feel of the classical loading panel. It is lightweigh, very fast and highly customizable UI control allowing users to supply information for their audience until a process is on its way.
library.name: ShieldUI jQuery LoadingPanel

library.description: The ShieldUI MaskedTextBox component allows users to specify a mask that user entered information must match. It makes the validation process easier, supplying more intuitive information to the audience.
library.name: ShieldUI jQuery MaskedTextBox component

library.description:
The ShieldUI MonthYearPicker component - is a lightweight, very fast and highly customizable UI control which allows you to select a date and perform an action. 
The control contains internally ShieldUI Calendar widget which allows you to navigate through months and years. 
The Calendar is confugured to show its month view as a start view. In that way the users can select only year and month. 
The MonthYearPicker has rich client side API for interaction with the component.
library.name: ShieldUI jQuery MonthYearPicker component

library.description: The ShieldUI NumericTextBox component for limiting the user input to a number. The control also allows quick increment/decrement operations, custom text rendering templates, keyboard navigation and events offering enhanced user experience.
library.name: ShieldUI jQuery NumericTextBox component

library.description:
The ShieldUI Pager component - is a lightweigh, very fast and highly customizable UI control, offering users the funcionality of dividing large sequences of informations into pages.
It supports intuitive and reliable navigation between the pages.
library.name: ShieldUI jQuery Pager component

library.description: A highly-customizable, jQuery-compatible datepicker/timepicker (calendar/clock widget) and a powerful Date/String parse/format utility.
library.name: Any+Time™ JavaScript Library

library.description: Filepicker.io adds a full Filesystem API to javascript, even in older browsers, so you can do read and write operations. It also integrates for you with dropbox, google drive, facebook, the user's webcam, and 13 other cloud sources to pull in or save content
library.name: Filepicker.io

library.description: betterCheckbox is a jquery plugin that allows you to customize your checkbox forms using CSS.
library.name: betterCheckbox

library.description: A jQuery plugin to make gathering lists of data with text inputs more user friendly and intuitive.
library.name: Listy-Text

library.description:
SWFUpload is a JavaScript Library that wraps the Flash Player's upload function. It brings your uploads to the next level with Multiple File Selection, Upload Progress and Client-side File Size Checking.

Unlike other Flash upload tools, SWFUpload leaves the UI in the developer's hands. Using a set of event handlers developers can display upload progress and status to the user in their own HTML/CSS UI.

SWFUpload has been featured in such projects as YouTube and WordPress.
library.name: SWFUpload

library.description: oCalendar is a jQuery plugin that allows you to add an event calendar to your sites or projects easily. You can add, edit and delete events from the client side.
library.name: oCalendar

library.description: MagiCalender is a visual calender jQuery script that will allow you to add important dates and upcoming events to your website. It has a “smart” search feature, allowing you to search dates and event names. The event descriptions can handle HTML , and the script itself is all XHTML compliant.
library.name: MagiCalender

library.description: Timeline is simple JavaScript driven calendar, which is written on top of jQuery JavaScript framework. Timeline is a horizontal representation of days in month. It can be used to display unlimited number of events with their descriptions.
library.name: Timeline calendar

library.description: Full month calendar jQuery plugin that looks like Google Calendar.
library.name: jQuery Frontier Calendar

library.description: Date Picker component with a lot of options and easy to fit in your web application.
library.name: Date Picker

library.description: wdCalendar is a jquery based google calendar clone. It cover most google calendar features. User can choose to have a daily view, weekly view or monthly view. User can easily create, update or remove events by drag & drop. It is very simple to to integrate wdCalendar with a database.
library.name: wdCalendar

library.description: jCal is a an innovative and sexy jQuery datepicker plugin that offers multi-day, multi-month calender datepicker options.
library.name: jCal

library.description: Yet another attempt writing a datePicker (calendar) that is accessible using the keyboard, requires no embedded JavaScript blocks, uses no pop-up windows and is suitable for use within documents served as application/xhtml+xml.
library.name: Unobtrusive Date-Picker Widget

library.description: The datepicker is tied to a standard form input field. Focus on the input (click, or use the tab key) to open an interactive calendar in a small overlay. Choose a date, click elsewhere on the page (blur the input), or hit the Esc key to close. If a date is chosen, feedback is shown as the input's value.
library.name: jQuery UI Datepicker

library.description: jMonthCalendar is a full month calendar that supports events. You simply initialize the calendar with options and an events array and it can handle the rest. The plugin does have extension points that allow the developer to interact with the calendar when the display is about to change months, after the display has changed months and when the event bubbles are clicked on. jMonthCalendar now supports hover extension points, hover over an event and trigger an event like an alert(); By default the events would each have a URL supplied that would link to a details page.
library.name: jMonthCalendar

library.description: The jQuery plugin for color editing on your website.
library.name: ExColor

library.description: JSColor is a simple & user-friendly color picker for your HTML forms. It extends all desired  fields of a color selection dialog. You can pickerize your input fields in two easy steps
library.name: JSColor

library.description:
This colorPicker is a light weight all-rounder (~ 29kB - only 1 file*; 12.8kB gZiped) that can display and let you choose the entire color palette in HSB and RGB color modes.

This highly customizable, easy to install and speed optimized app comes in 4 different sizes (from 151 x 87 pixels to 407 x 302 pixels) and therefore different feature levels so you can use it for every supposable cause from 'easy choice' to 'professional determination'. That's probably all you'll ever need to let your clients choose the right color. You'll also find a lot of extra helpers and smart features that make life easier.
library.name: JavaScript ColorPicker

library.description: Farbtastic is a jQuery plug-in that can add one or more color picker widgets into a page through JavaScript. Each widget is then linked to an existing element (e.g. a text field) and will update the element's value when a color is selected.
library.name: Farbtastic

library.description: mooRainbow is a powerful Javascript color picker that allows you to visually choose and use colors as a real and useful application.
library.name: mooRainbow

library.description: jPicker is a fast, lightweight jQuery plugin for including an advanced color picker in your web projects. It has been painstakenly ported from John Dyers' awesome work on his picker using the Prototype framework.
library.name: jPicker

library.description: A jQuery plugin that suggests and autocompletes the domain in email fields.
library.name: jQuery Email Autocomplete

library.description:
Light weight Javascript client based search engine.
Program (.NET) generates a Javascript search index and provides you the code to implement it with ease in your website.
library.name: JSearch

library.description: Multipicker is jQuery plugin for selecting days, numbers or other elements, it supports multi selecting (like checkboxes) or single element selection (like radio buttons).
library.name: Multipicker

library.description: A JavaScript Calendar
library.name: Kalendae

library.description:
Modular and light-weight selection library.

Compatible with React and jQuery. Can also be used stand-alone.
library.name: Selectivity

library.description: A jQuery plugin that displays typeahead and autocompletes the domain whenever your users type in an email address field.
library.name: jquery.email-autocomplete
